title: S rank borders on profile
body: The season highest rank in the champion tab on the profile, I was wondering if they go away after the end of the season because im trying to get everyone that border and it would be sad if they would all go

replies.body:
The season highest rank and the little gold border they have are separate indicators. 

The little gold border shows that you have received a chest on that champion this season, so upon the start of season 7 those borders will disappear. Given the weekly box limit, it isn't possible to get that border on all champions.

The season highest rank is exactly what it says, and will also reset once season 7 commences.
